subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Gonzalo Higuaín silenced his critics with a decisive strike in the eighth minute, and Argentina held on against a Belgian team that had difficulty creating chances against a stout defense.
snippet: Gonzalo Higuaín silenced his critics with a decisive strike in the eighth minute, and Argentina held on against a Belgian team that had difficulty creating chances against a stout defense.
